name: Donphan
description: The Armor Pokémon. Donphan's favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this Pokémon can't stop very easily.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: When taking damage equal to half or more of your current HP, roll a d4. On a result of 3 of 4, halve the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.
